attributes.action: Include pip, dla and contribution based benefits into the cost of living payment
attributes.additional_details: Make disabled equal! Disabled are as seen as second class citizens, this isn’t fair.
attributes.background: This shows once again those in most need, the disabled are shoved to the curb once again, most who’ve worked for years and paid ni contributions, and end up with a disability, are only entitled to contribution based esa, which isn’t not included in the cost of living payments.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617425
